h1. Profile

{{html:
  <div ng-controller="UsersController">
    <form name="form" ng-submit="updatePassword()">
      <div class="tab-pane row margin-bottom-large margin-left-medium">
        <div class="nameField width-full margin-bottom-medium">
           <label class="left control-group margin-all-none margin-right-medium line-height txt-14 width-15">Current password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="oldPassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge width-20 left margin-right-medium">
        </div>
        <div class="nameField width-full margin-bottom-medium">
           <label class="left control-group margin-all-none margin-right-medium line-height txt-14 width-15">New password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="newPassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge width-20 left margin-right-medium">
        </div>
        <div class="nameField width-full margin-bottom-medium">
           <label class="left control-group margin-all-none margin-right-medium line-height txt-14 width-15">Retype password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="retypePassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge width-20 left">
        </div>
      </div>
        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-info btn-large margin-top-large">Update Password</button>
        <div class="txt-center">
          <div class="alert txt-center margin-top-large width-40" ng-class="{'alert-success': alertStatus=='success', 'alert-danger': alertStatus=='error'}" ng-show="updateResultMessage">{[ updateResultMessage ]}</div>
        </div>
      </form>
  </div>

    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/UserServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/UserController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
